response.original_title: The Super Mario Bros. Super Show!: Count Koopula
response.overview: This episode is a parody of the story Dracula, with Count Koopula playing the part of the story's titular character and main antagonist, Count Dracula. Additionally, Mousigor is a reference to Igor/Fritz from the Frankenstein series of films, and Turtlevania is based on the country of Transylvania. Finally, Wereturtles are a parody of werewolves.  Our heroes are lured into a spooky castle in the Land of Turtlevania where Count Koopula plans to turn the Princess into a spaghetti-sauce-sucking vampire.  Plus:  - Vampire Until Ready - Koopenstein - Robokoopa
response.title: The Super Mario Bros. Super Show!: Count Koopula
